ModMetaData.name: Vulpine Race Pack (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018389163
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/VulpineRacePack][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img]
The Fenii and Frijjid are Vulpine races nased on Fennec (Vulpes/Fennecus Zerpa) and arctic (Vulpes Lagopus) foxes respectively. Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co. Frijjid art by Mikerobe
